# Sample URLs for Graceful Parsing Tests
# These URLs demonstrate various edge cases and parameter combinations

# Standard valid URLs
/img/test.jpg/800x600
/img/photo.png/1024x768
/img/banner.webp/1920x1080

# URLs with query parameters
/img/test.jpg/800x600?quality=85
/img/test.jpg/800x600?quality=95&format=webp
/img/test.jpg/800x600?format=png&quality=80

# Complex URLs with multiple parameters
/img/test.jpg/800x600?quality=85&format=webp&cache=true
/img/test.jpg/800x600?q=90&fmt=jpg&w=800&h=600

# URLs with special characters in filenames
/img/test-image.jpg/800x600
/img/test_image_01.jpg/800x600
/img/image.2024.01.jpg/800x600
/img/photo-01_v2.jpg/800x600

# Invalid dimension formats (should use defaults)
/img/test.jpg/invalid
/img/test.jpg/800
/img/test.jpg/x600
/img/test.jpg/800x
/img/test.jpg/0x0
/img/test.jpg/-100x-100

# URLs with duplicate parameters (first should win)
/img/test.jpg/800x600?quality=85&quality=95
/img/test.jpg/800x600?format=jpg&format=png

# URLs with invalid parameter values (should use defaults)
/img/test.jpg/800x600?quality=invalid
/img/test.jpg/800x600?quality=200
/img/test.jpg/800x600?format=invalid

# Edge cases
/img/test.jpg/10x10
/img/test.jpg/4000x4000
/img/test.jpg/800x600?
/img/test.jpg/800x600?&
/img/test.jpg/800x600?&&quality=85

# Grouped images
/img/cats/default.jpg/800x600
/img/cats/cat_white.jpg/800x600
/img/dogs/puppy.jpg/800x600

# Default image fallback
/img/{default_image}/800x600
/img/nonexistent.jpg/800x600

# Large dimensions
/img/test.jpg/2048x1536
/img/test.jpg/3840x2160

# Small dimensions
/img/test.jpg/50x50
/img/test.jpg/100x100

# Different aspect ratios
/img/test.jpg/800x600
/img/test.jpg/600x800
/img/test.jpg/1920x1080
/img/test.jpg/1080x1920

# Format conversions
/img/test.jpg/800x600?format=webp
/img/test.png/800x600?format=jpeg
/img/test.webp/800x600?format=png
